alert.note: Alert for Chemung; Steuben (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Binghamton (South Central New York and Northeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 15 at 5:49PM EDT by NWS Binghamton
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Chemung and eastern Steuben Counties through 615 PM EDT... At 549 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Hornby, or 7 miles northeast of Corning, moving southeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Big Flats, Horseheads, Millport, Horseheads North, Fisherville, Mark Twain State Park, Beaver Dams, Tompkins Corners, Chambers and Big Flats Airport. This includes the following highway exits... Interstate 86/Route 17 between 50 and 52B. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
